name: Zombie Home Improvement Defender
description:
Zombie Home Improvement Defender

Home is a safe and cozy place away from the everyday problems in life- like Zombies. Sometimes those problems can follow you home and when they do they start destroying your beautiful home decor!

Features:

-Intense fast paced FPS action

-Aim Down Sight firing

-Damage based on shot location

-Home Decor like Beds, Ovens, Ferns, and more that boosts your players ability!

-Endless waves of zombie action!

How To Play:

Defend your house from the oncoming Zombie waves by shooting all the zombies. After each wave you will be able to buy decor for your home. Decor will also give you upgrades such as more damage/ammo regen/ etc. Be careful! Zombies hate decor and will try to destroy it! Survive as many waves as you can!

Thanks for playing!
